alert.note: Alert for Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 05 at 7:53PM EDT until September 05 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, Bullitt, Hardin, Larue, Nelson and Washington. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elizabethtown, Bardstown, Lebanon Junction, Bloomfield, Fairfield, Cravens, Bellwood, Samuels Field Airport, Hunters and Balltown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
